sourcesContent: üéì UNIFOR home Home school Cursos calendar_month Semestres menu_book Disciplinas admin_panel_settings Administra√ß√£o assignment Matriz Curricular import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-layout', templateUrl: './layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./layout.component.scss'] }) export class LayoutComponent { username = 'Usu√°rio'; // depois vir√° do Keycloak hasRole(role: string): boolean { // Simula√ß√£o tempor√°ria at√© integrar o Keycloak const mockRoles = ['ADMIN', 'COORDENADOR', 'PROFESSOR', 'ALUNO']; return mockRoles.includes(role); } }
